last_story: Once upon a time, in the small town of Willow Creek, there lived a boy named Jack. Jack was a curious and adventurous kid, always looking for something new and exciting to do. One day, while playing outside, he stumbled upon an old cardboard box full of dusty books.Intrigued by the old pages, Jack picked up one of the books and started flipping through it. It was a guidebook for a magical land called WD. Jack's eyes widened with excitement as he read about the mysterious creatures and enchanted forests that lay beyond the pages.Unable to resist his curiosity, Jack decided to embark on a journey to WD. He packed a small bag with snacks, a flashlight, and the guidebook, and set out on his adventure through the woods.As he trekked deeper into the forest, Jack encountered all sorts of magical creatures - unicorns with glittering manes, mischievous fairies dancing in the trees, and even a talking tree who offered him words of wisdom.Just as Jack thought he had seen it all, he stumbled upon a castle made entirely out of candy. The candy castle was guarded by an army of gingerbread men, but Jack managed to sneak past them and enter the castle.
